medical_history.chief_complaint: Several-month history of fevers, chills, and fatigue.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began soon after percutaneous coronary intervention with stent placement 10 months prior. Initially treated with ciprofloxacin for 5 days, temporary relief was observed. Symptoms returned 1 week after stopping antibiotics and led to hospitalization for further evaluation.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of coronary artery disease, peripheral vascular disease, mild congestive heart failure, type 2 diabetes mellitus, hyperlipidemia, and gastroesophageal reflux. Previous surgeries include coronary-artery bypass grafting 20 years ago, angioplasty of left anterior descending artery 7 years ago, and aortobifemoral and femoralâ€“popliteal bypass with stent placement 17 months prior.
medical_history.family_history: Notable for early-onset coronary artery disease in his father and brother.
medical_history.social_history: Current smoker with a 75 pack-year smoking history and infrequent alcohol consumption.
